DatacloudContact.name: DatacloudContact
DatacloudContact.description: The fields and properties for Data.com contact records.

City.description: The city where the company is located.

CompanyId.description: The unique numerical identifier for the company and the Data.com company identification number or Data.com Key.

ContactId.description: The unique numeric identifier for this contact.

Country.description: The standard abbreviation or name for the country where the company is located. Note You can enter a comma-separated list of countries; however, for a country that uses a comma in its name, leave out the comma. For example, enter “Taiwan, ROC” as Taiwan ROC.

Department.description: The department in the company that the contact is affiliated with. The values of this field are fixed enumerated values. Engineering Finance Human Resources IT Marketing Operations Other Sales Support

Email.description: A business email address for the contact.

ExternalId.description: A unique system-generated numerical identifier for the contact.

FirstName.description: The first name of the contact.

IsInCrm.description: Whether the record is in Salesforce (true) or not (false).

IsInactive.description: Whether the record is active (false) or not (true).

IsOwned.description: True: You own this record. False: You do not own this record.

LastName.description: The last name of the contact.

Level.description: A human resource label that designates a person’s level in the company. The values of this field are fixed enumerated values. C-Level VP Director Manager Staff Other

Phone.description: The direct-dial telephone number for the contact.

SocialHandles.description: The DatacloudSocialHandles object is a child of the DatacloudContact object.

State.description: The state where the company is located, which can also be a province or other equivalent to a state, depending on the country where the company is located.

Street.description: The street address for the company where the contact works.

Title.description: Title of the contact such as CEO or Vice President.

UpdatedDate.description: The last date and time when the information for a contact was updated.

Zip.description: The postal or zip code for the address.
